name: Deprecated
description: True if this foreign key is deprecated.

name: Internal
description: If true then do not display this item in automatic documentation.

name: OnDelete
description: Specifies what referential action to take when the key value is deleted from the foreign table.

name: OnUpdate
description: Specifies what referential action to take when the key value is updated in the foreign table.

name: SqlName
description: Specifies an alternate name for this foreign key when referred to via SQL.
